text: visvasavantayingen vu samuhayan dekak taman tula aravul æti kara gatahot (samuhayan) deka atare samadana kara harinu. pasuva ovungen ek (samuhayak) anit (samuhaya) kerehi (simava ikmava) aparadha kalahot, aparadha kala aya, allahge niyogayan desata pæminena turu ovun samaga oba (viruddhava) yuddha karanu. ovun (allahge niyogayan desata) hærunahot sadharana andamata ema (samuhayan) deka atare samadana kara harinu. (mehi) oba sadharana andamata katayutu karanu. niyata vasayenma allah viniscayakaruvanva priya karanneya
